synopsis.text: With a knock at her door, Ao Gennai's ordinary life takes an unexpected turn as she receives a mysterious parcel. Inside, she discovers Gourai, a petite yet powerful robot known as a Frame Arms Girl. Equipped with an advanced AI, Gourai possesses a unique 'Artificial Self' that enables her to develop a personality and learn from her surroundings. Unbeknownst to Ao, she becomes the first human to activate Gourai, thus beginning a journey filled with surprises and challenges. As Gourai collects battle data and experiences a range of emotions, Ao finds herself navigating the unpredictable world of Frame Arms Girls, all while forming a special bond with her new robotic companion. Join Ao and Gourai as they explore the true meaning of friendship and humanity in this engaging anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
